title: A small blue car is parked in front of a Wal-Mart entrance
description: Wal-Mart's response to Hurricane Katrina showed how quickly a privately-owned business could mobilize its resources during a disaster. (Image courtesy of Dennis Sylvester Hurd on Flickr.)

image_metadata.caption: Wal-Mart's response to Hurricane Katrina showed how quickly a privately-owned business could mobilize its resources during a disaster. (Image courtesy of [Dennis Sylvester Hurd](http://www.flickr.com/photos/dennissylvesterhurd/196366883/) on Flickr.)
image_metadata.credit: Image courtesy of Dennis Sylvester Hurd on Flickr.
